mapper.select: select s.stage_name from company c,stage s where c.user_no = #{user_no} and c.user_no = s.user_no

select s.user_no,to_char(b.bus_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD"("dy")"') bus_date,b.requirements from stage s, buskingdate b where s.user_no = #{user_no} and s.stage_name = #{stage_name} and s.stage_no = b.stage_no and sysdate <= b.bus_date order by bus_date asc
